cause.description:
I am training to run the Nike Women's Marathon with is an event to raise funds for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. This is a nonprofit organization that is fighting to end the battle against leukemia and lymphoma.
Please help support me by MAKING AN ONLINE DONATION AT MY HOME PAGE: http://www.active.com/donate/tntvan/leannetompkins and make an online donation!
Thank you for your support!
1. Help end the battle against leukemia and lymphoma
cause.mission: stop leukemia and lymphoma from taking any more lives
cause.name: Help Leanne fundraise for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society
